name: Candy Catapult
description:
Use your Candy Catapult to take out the candy pieces in this fun game of skill and reflexes! Fling, bounce, and ricochet your candies around the playing area! Use special candies to take out multiple candies at once! Survive as long as you can in Endless Mode, accumulate as many points as possible in Timed Mode, or work your way through 48 progressively-difficult levels in Campaign Mode!

GAMEPLAY
Slide your finger left and right to rotate the candy catapult, then release to send the candy flying across the screen. Match three or more types of the same candy to remove them from the game board. But be careful as the candies are continually descending - if the candies reach the dotted line, it’s Game Over!

For more information, please refer to the How to Play screens within the app.

FEATURES
- A fun game of skill and reflexes!
- Instantly accessible pick-up-and-play gameplay!
- Intuitive touch-screen controls!
- Suitable for players of all ages!
- Three different power-up candies!
- Multiple Playing Modes, including Endless and Timed!
- 48 unlockable levels to master!
- Catchy background music!
- Fun particle effects!
